about_the_game:
Bite Size Terrors:

Are Short Experimental Horror Experiences each with their own Unique Genres and Styles.
From the Creator of Notebook Entries, this is...

eye candy:

  • SHORT. Less than an Hour.
  • A Suspenseful Horror that displays Color Theory in a Stylized Motion.
  • Discover who you play as time progresses, finding out there's more to what meets the eye.
  • Black & White Manga Style.
  • Sound Design is meticulously built and well known in this series.

Story:

Playing as Frank, you install security cams as your day job. One day you get a call that freezes you to your core.
Time Stops.
You Know This Address.
You Know What Happened.
You Know What Needs To Be Done.

Gameplay:

A Horror Experience.
You Work Your Job. You Walk. You Drive. You Install Cameras.
Simple Mechanics with an emphasis on Story Building, Sound Design, Music, Mood Changes & Delivering Experimental Horror Like Movies..
